alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central West Feliciana, St. Helena, northeastern Livingston, East Feliciana and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, southwestern Pike, eastern Wilkinson and Amite Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Centreville to near Roseland. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Liberty, Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Centreville, Independence, Roseland, Albany, Gloster, Wilson, Osyka, Norwood, Montpelier, Darlington, Felps, Gillsburg, Easleyville and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 39 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
